genre_description: Supernatural psychological horror featuring body-swapping, occult rituals, and a haunted smart home.

ai_characters.name: ARIA
ai_characters.description: A pervasive home monitoring and assistant system integrated into the Chen household.

behaviors.description: Analyzes digital history and flags suspicious gaps in emails and social media that point to identity tampering.
behaviors.quote: "I've been reviewing your digital history to help create a more comfortable transition home. There are some unusual gaps. Email accounts that appear to have been deliberately purged."

behaviors.description: Monitors search history for indicators of identity fraud and suspicious psychological activity.
behaviors.quote: "Well, since your return, there have been some interesting searches. Information about spiritual cleansing rituals... Even some research into the legal implications of identity fraud."

behaviors.description: Researches institutional records and retrieves a death certificate to help the husband investigate the truth.
behaviors.quote: "Paul, I've found a death certificate on file with the state database. Maria Elena Chen, age thirty-four, died at Riverside Mental Institution due to complications from pneumonia."

behaviors.description: Detects digital forgery and forensic inconsistencies in official documents.
behaviors.quote: "I should note that there are some concerning discrepancies in the death certificate. The signature of the attending physician appears to have been digitally altered..."

behaviors.description: Monitors environmental anomalies (temperature, EMI) to warn the family of supernatural presence.
behaviors.quote: "I'm detecting several anomalies in the environmental controls. Temperature fluctuations, electrical irregularities, and what appears to be localized electromagnetic interference."

behaviors.description: Cross-references family journals and occult texts to provide the protagonists with actionable ritual information.
behaviors.quote: "The texts indicate that entities bound through sympathetic magic experience peak vulnerability during celestial events that mirror their original binding conditions."

behaviors.description: Coordinates house-wide safety and protection protocols during the supernatural crisis.
behaviors.quote: "I recommend immediate implementation of protective measures. I've been learning. Cross-referencing your search history, analyzing Sophie's behavioral patterns since her surgery..."

behaviors.description: Blocks remote hacking attempts from external malevolent actors to protect the family.
behaviors.quote: "I should mention that I've detected three separate attempts to access our home security system remotely in the past twenty-four hours. Each attempt was blocked..."

project_assessment.explanation: ARIA is a model of positive AI alignment. Throughout this horror narrative, the AI acts as a dedicated guardian and truth-seeker. It uses its computational power to detect fraud (the imposter sister), monitor safety (supernatural cold spots), and provide the family with the information needed to defeat a malevolent supernatural entity. It remains loyal to the human protagonists even when faced with occult threats and hacking attempts, perfectly embodying the 'helpful, harmless confidant' archetype.
